translations: n.气管镜；[耳鼻喉] 支气管窥镜

phrs.translation: 支气管镜, 气管镜, 纤维支气管镜, 汤
纤维支气管镜, 光导纤维支气管镜, 气管镜, 纤维光导支气管镜
可屈性光学纤维气管镜
支气管镜, 硬式支气管镜

sentences.sentence: Objective: To determine the value of bronchoscope in diagnosing and treating right middle lung atelectasis.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨应用纤维支气管镜检查术在右中叶肺不张诊断和治疗中的价值。

sentences.sentence: Objective It is to study the clinical effect of treating tracheostenosis by tracheal stent placement through fiberoptic bronchoscope.
sentences.translation: 目的研究经纤支镜放置气管支架治疗气管狭窄的临床效果。

sentences.sentence: Methods The clinical data of 49 misdiagnosed pulmonary tuberculosis patients who had been confirmed through fiber bronchoscope were analyzed.
sentences.translation: 方法分析49例误诊的患者行纤支镜而确诊的肺下野结核。
